images.caption: Figure 1:(top)Tropical attentionwith sharp attention maps on learning theQuickselectalgorithm, showcasing a size-invariance and OOD lengths generalization behavior far beyond training (8→1024→810248\rightarrow 10248 → 1024). Figure 2:Stacked attention head representations for Quickselect under (a) Vanilla, (b) Adaptive, and (c)Tropicalmodels. Each model was trained on length 8 sequences and was evaluated from Left to Right on length 16 to 1024 sequences. Each image was generated by a batch of 32 inputs.
